New Records: Leg-spinner Adil Rashid has now moved level with Stuart Broad as England’s leading wicket taker in men’s T20 World Cups with 30.
Key Match Events: Chris Jordan took a hat-trick and four wickets in five balls as England bowled USA out for 115
Jos Buttler scored 83* off 38 balls with 7 sixes
Pre-Game Insights: England captain Jos Buttler said that net run rate was in their thoughts and they wanted to target USA with the wind
Post-Match Reflections: USA skipper Aaron Jones said that they weren't as disciplined as they should be and their shot selection wasn't the best
Player of the match Adil Rashid said that they played exceptionally well and set the tone with the ball
Miscellaneous Highlights: England are through to the semi-finals of the T20 World Cup regardless of what happens in the match between South Africa and West Indies
The semi-final will be played on a Wednesday (Thursday 01:30 BST) in Trinidad or Thursday (15:30 BST) in Guyana
